summary.span: 命名空間包含 .NET Framework 快取功能的組態處理常式類別。

span.span: The namespace contains configuration handler classes for the .NET Framework caching feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命名空間中的組態處理常式類別會搭配.NET Framework 應用程式一般快取。The configuration handler classes in this namespace are for general caching used with .NET Framework applications. ASP.NET 快取的組態處理常式中所包含命名空間。The configuration handlers for ASP.NET caching are contained in the namespace.
